Are you a beginner web developer? Do you feel lost with all this information about the modern websites using databases as the source of their content? It is very possible that you are in the right place. The following course is dedicated to students who have already started coding their first websites and would like to learn more about how to handle the more complex data .The course starts with the introduction of the basic SQL syntaxes and shows how to connect the database with the front end.
